import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { MdRemoveCircleOutline, MdAddCircleOutline, MdDelete, } from 'react-icons/md'; import { Container, ProductTable, Total } from './styles'; function Cart({ cart }) { return ( PRODUCT QTD SUBTOTAL {cart.map(product => ( {product.title} $124.99
U$258,80 ))}
TOTAL U$1920,28
); } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ cart: stage.cart, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Cart);
